content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "ice", "quantity": 14, "index": 11}, {"type": "hay_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "nether_wart", "quantity": 34, "index": 22}, {"type": "firework_rocket", "quantity": 55, "index": 29}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 35, "index": 34}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a cookie, I first need to craft wheat. I have a hay_block in slot 13 that I can craft into 9 wheat, so I will move it to slot 1 of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "wheat", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "hay_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "ice", "quantity": 14, "index": 11}, {"type": "nether_wart", "quantity": 34, "index": 22}, {"type": "firework_rocket", "quantity": 55, "index": 29}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 35, "index": 34}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: The hay_block has been crafted into 9 wheat, so I will move the wheat to an empty inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 9

TASK: Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "ice", "quantity": 14, "index": 11}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 9, "index": 12}, {"type": "nether_wart", "quantity": 34, "index": 22}, {"type": "firework_rocket", "quantity": 55, "index": 29}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 35, "index": 34}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that I have 9 wheat, I need to craft a cookie. I will move 1 wheat to slot 1 of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "wheat", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "ice", "quantity": 14, "index": 11}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 8, "index": 12}, {"type": "nether_wart", "quantity": 34, "index": 22}, {"type": "firework_rocket", "quantity": 55, "index": 29}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 35, "index": 34}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: Next, I need to move the cocoa_beans to slot 2 of the crafting grid, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "wheat", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "ice", "quantity": 14, "index": 11}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 8, "index": 12}, {"type": "nether_wart", "quantity": 34, "index": 22}, {"type": "firework_rocket", "quantity": 55, "index": 29}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 35, "index": 34}]
thought: Finally, I need to move 1 wheat to slot 3 of the crafting grid, which is to the right of slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "cookie", "quantity": 8, "index": 0}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "ice", "quantity": 14, "index": 11}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 7, "index": 12}, {"type": "nether_wart", "quantity": 34, "index": 22}, {"type": "firework_rocket", "quantity": 55, "index": 29}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 35, "index": 34}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the cookie, I will move it to an empty inventory slot (eg., 13).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 8
